name: Jennifer Tabish

text: Regular antipasto salad feeds 2. Amazing customer service. Great place, good for the price.

name: Cynthia Garcia
text: Extremely friendly staff. Having a high sensitivity to gluten, I was pleased to hear they take the necessary precautions to prevent cross-contamination. They even gave me fresh out of the bag toppings. The gluten free crust was great as well. Overall, a very satisfied experience!

name: Ivan Dell
text: Really good pizza and wings.. great service friendly staff.

name: tampa bay
text:
My family and I have visited Marco's Pizza twice and had a very pleasant experience on both occasions.
On our first visit we were greeted promptly and eagerly assisted with any ‚Ä¶More

name: Paul Schulte
text: Very clean. Service was great. Pizza was fair. A small space so it is really for a quick bite or take out. Large parking lot used by several food sites. They also deliver, which is important for some.

name: TLUE - Law of Attaction Adventures
text: Fantastic pizza! Crust was crispy on the outside and soft on the inside. Sauce was above average and toppings were delicious. Glad we just happened to stop in tonight.

name: Lori Dunne
text: We went back soon after our first visit. Very good pizza, good service, nice patio. We had a 3 cheese pepperoni with a buttered crust. I'm not the big pizza eater in our family and I was craving it after trying it the first time.

name: Anne Svalstad
text: Pizza, Wings, Salads, Subs, and Brownies! Don't forget to try the CheezyBread! Delivery, Carry Out and Dine in options!

name: chris A
text: Service was great. Prices ok. Pizza was pretty good. Little greasy on the left overs. But not bad.

name: Britney Carpenter
text: My husband and I really enjoy the pizza and cheesy bread here. Much better quality and taste than other chains. I do not recommend getting delivery from here though. The pizza took forever to get to us, was not fresh by the time it got ‚Ä¶More

name: Jerome White
text: Amazing Service each time we've come here! Family friendly and always super clean fun place to visit. Would highly recommend!

name: George Unruh
text: Marco‚Äôs Pizza is excellent But the DoorDash delivery was a  total disaster and totally unacceptable! Late, wrong order, snippy driver, I will blamed everything on Marco‚Äôs and also lied that he had the wrong address but he had the right ‚Ä¶More

name: Kayla Cobb
text: The pizza was very delicious and fresh! They give you your moneys worth and the workers we're very friendly and helpful . Great customer service. I would recommend

name: Arianna Robbins
text: This website says they close at 12am but they changed their time to 11pm. We got there at 10:55pm and they served us and did a great job! Service was great and the pizza is looks great.

name: Chelly Agre
text: The pizza is fresh the service is good and the food is affordable. Seating not very comfortable but ambiance is good.

name: Tracea Roback
text: Food is delicious.  Owners fantastically awesome. We were stoked to see Marcos in Gilbert, AZ after going to Fargo, ND location and loving it!

name: Heather Sanders
text: Order for delivery, which was amazingly FAST! I believe maybe 20 mins!? So that was GREAT! The steak and cheese sub was really good!! The Cesar salad was good other than I had order chicken on the side (due to me being pregnant and I have ‚Ä¶More

name: Joel Baltrus
text: Very tasty pizza, nice selection of local beer, and friendly staff. A nice little quiet place.

name: Becky Swan
text: We love Marco's Pizza!  Great pizza and friendly staff!  So happy we found them!

name: Anne Svalstad
text: OMG! Love Marco's Pizza. The crust and pizza options are delicious. Wonderful staff!  Great food! Love this place.

name: Joshiwa Benjamin
text: Just had them for the first time. Pizza was delicious and service was super friendly! Will order again. Thank you!

name: Aaron Childs
text: This place doesn't feel like a chain at all. Our family loves the cheesy bread, careful, it's like super addicting. Tip: order the romasean seasoning or however they spell it, it makes the cheesy bread and pizza crust amazing. Very buttery ‚Ä¶More

name: Aleigh Brower
text: Marco's Pizza is an awesome place to eat at! The service is great and the employees are super friendly and helpful. The cheezy bread is to die for!

name: Victoria Bowling
text: Awesome! The owner and the people are fabulous! Love them. Great place to go. Highly recommended.

name: Ashley Buker
text: Yummy pizza. Great staff. Awesome owner. Anne is great

name: Tariah Webber
text: Marco's is an amazing place and they have great customer service. I felt so welcome when I walked in and they all yelled, "Welcome to Marco's". 10/10 recommend and I will definitely be back.

name: AMANDA SEARCY
text: Love this place! Food and staff are by far the best.

text: Over priced for average pizza. Friendly people which I always appreciate. It just isn‚Äôt memorably delicious

text: Took an hour and 20 minutes for my delivery it wasn't very hot but I will say it was a very good pizza. They need to step up delivery or give customers money off.
